about_the_game:
Background

Moolii’s Dreamland is a 2D hand-drawn horizontal flying Bullet-hell indie game that restores classic arcade gameplay. Players will play as the little fox Moolii. One night, Moolii was forced to bed by her mom. While she was in sleep, she experienced physical oppression and alarm from the family pets, and the mischief of friends and relatives, thus entering a world of strange dreams. In her nightmare, Moolii got powerful skills, allowing her to destroy all the monsters!


Whimsical Designs for Stages and Monsters
Some of the animals, scenes and characters in the game are all inspired by people and things around the developer. For example, there are five ferrets, a dog and two sugar gliders raised by the developer, who will accompany you in the game in a strange but cute way. In addition, the design for each stage is not only purely about horizontal flying, but also has some brainstorming ideas and designs, waiting for you to explore!

Feel The Coolness of Classic Arcade Shooting Gameplay!

The game was developed by a solo developer, inspired by the FC console from our childhood classic: Salamander and other classics. The gameplay of Moolii’s Dreamland is more about flying bullet-hell game in a horizontal version. Once you go forward, there is no turning back. It requires our players’ bravery. So don’t be afraid, use the combo trick of ammos and melee attacks, fight a way out for Moolii!

Diverse Bosses and Monsters

In Moolii’s nightmare, players will face different types of monsters and bosses in different areas, each with their own unique appearances and ways of attacks. From the owl who will pour down hot water to the mad cow who will go on a rampage, these monsters all come with skills ranging from sudden advances to a variety of wind-blade ammo attacks, testing your reflexes to cope with a variety of difficult levels.

Cute 2D hand-drawn Style and Plot

The game features a lively and cute 2D hand-drawn style, telling the story of Little Fox Moolii took place both in the real world and the dream world. It showcases Little Moolii's wonderful imagination and the lively and loving Fox family.

Whimsical Design of Scenes in Moolii’s Dreamland

The Cat Forest, where all canines are unwelcome (including Little Moolii), the Dry Pond occupied by bully of the family "King Duck", and the Rushing Plains where is filled with goats and cows... As Moolii travels to these strange places, you'll battle the monsters and bosses. Also, watch out for flying obstacles and moving maps!

Multiple Ammo Types and Skills

The game has a variety of ammo types and skills for players to choose from. Players can upgrade their skills and attributes to successfully defeat the oncoming monsters through a combination of melee claw strikes, long-range ammo and skill releases. You can also use your anger to enter a "Super State", which allows you to quickly kill a large number of enemies with a snap of your fingers!

Background

Moolii’s Dreamland is a 2D hand-drawn horizontal flying Bullet-hell indie game that restores classic arcade gameplay. Players will play as the little fox Moolii. One night, Moolii was forced to bed by her mom. name: Moolii's Dreamland

subs.option_text: Moolii's Dreamland 哞哩的长梦 - $7.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: i3-6100
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA

cadpa.descriptors:
适龄提示
（1）本游戏是一款以梦境为主题背景的飞行射击游戏，适用于年满8周岁及以上的用户，建议未成年人在家长的监护下使用游戏产品。
（2）本游戏基于架空的故事背景和幻想世界观，剧情丰富且积极向上，没有基于真实历史和现实事件的改编内容。玩家将在游戏中扮演可爱的“哞哩”，在梦境中与怪物战斗，最终逃离梦境。是一款制作精良的国产卡通风格射击过关类的独立游戏。
（3）本游戏中有用户实名认证系统，认证为未成年人的用户将接受以下管理：
游戏中部分玩法和道具需要付费。未满8周岁的用户不得提供游戏充值服务；8周岁以上未满16周岁的用户，单次充值金额不得超过50元人民币，每月充值金额累计不得超过200元人民币；16周岁以上未满18周岁的用户，单次充值金额不得超过100元人民币，每月充值金额累计不得超过400元人民币。
未成年用户仅可在周五、周六、周日和法定节假日每日20时至21时体验游戏，且体验时长不得超过1小时，其他时间段禁用。
（4）本游戏以飞行射击为核心玩法，可以锻炼玩家的反应能力，能够给玩家带来愉悦的情绪体验，增强玩家的思考能力。

short_description: Moolii’s Dreamland is a Bullet-hell game. Players will play as the little fox Moolii to fight against monsters in her dream. This game features whimsical level designs, monsters, and powerful bosses, along with combos of ammo skills and magical tricks. Help Moolii wake up from her nightmare!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, German, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese
